INTRO.TEXT: ~y~You:~s~ Hello, I’m here about the call. You reported someone bothering you?

~g~Civilian:~s~ He kept insisting, saying he ‘needed it more than I do’. He wouldn’t take no for an answer.
~y~You:~s~ Did he threaten you or touch you in any way?
~g~Civilian:~s~ No, not really… but he was way too pushy. Made me uncomfortable.
~g~Civilian:~s~ I get that times are tough, but I shouldn’t be harassed just for walking down the street.
~y~You:~s~ Alright, I’ll go talk to him. Thanks for letting me know.

~o~Tramp:~s~ I get it, I get it… I wasn’t trying to cause trouble.

~o~Tramp:~s~ Alright… I’ll move along. Just trying to get by, you know?

~y~You:~s~ I understand. Thanks for letting us know. We’ll check on him and make sure he’s safe.
